description.b: In this tutorial we will see how to open an example report from the Samples. If the samples was not in your workspace you can also import them following this cheatsheet

item.title: Import the samples
item.description: Import the samples in the workspace folder "JasperReportsSamples". If you have already done this operation you can skip this step.

item.title: Compile the report
item.description: You can now compile the report by switching into the preview tab
